QuestData.Title: Stormherald Eljrrin
QuestData.Description: I have sent an emissary to the Halls of Lightning to take the battle to Loken.$B$BHe undoubtedly needs assistance, given the strength of Loken's armies. Lend him any aid you can so that we may finally stop the traitor.
QuestData.LogDescription: King Jokkum wants you to enter the Halls of Lightning and speak with Stormherald Eljrrin.
